content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest (position -16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0) 
-  Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0) 
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) 

### Lab at position (x, y)
Consists of lab (position not specified) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert items into an entity
-  Make sure you have the items to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
-  Ensure that entities which require fuel have a sufficient supply of fuel to operate
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that entities which require connections (e.g. pipes, electricity) are properly connected before attempting to use them
### Errors when trying to smelt items in a furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt items
### Errors when trying to use a burner mining drill
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to use it to mine resources
